0.4.0.name: wordpress/wp-admin-themer-extended
0.4.0.description:
WP Admin Themer Extended is a plugin that allows you to theme your WordPress admin pages and login pages. It allows to override the URL and ALT tag of the Wordpress logo on the login page.

Derivative work from wp-admin-themer, written by Manuel Amador (Rudd-O)

* http://rudd-o.com/projects/wp-admin-themer/
* http://rudd-o.com

The plugin will overrule all CSS files from within the plugin css directory. Via the admin interface you can add custom header and footer to your admin pages.

Checkout our other plugins at http://plugins.motionmill.com
